column1: Jack is in the kitchen in his house. Jack wants a cold drink from the refrigerator. The refrigerator is full of fresh food. A bird flies into the kitchen through the open window. Jack sees the bird fly into the kitchen.
Caden is in his new house. Caden wants to fix all the things that are not right. There is a big leak in the roof. A bird lands on the roof. Caden sees the bird land on the roof.

Vivi is in her room playing with her toys. Vivi wants to lay her small, patient triangle toy on the shelf with her other toys. The triangle toy is in her toy box. A bird flies into the room through the open window. Vivi sees the bird fly into the room.

Emma is in her room after a long day at school. Emma wants to draw on her white bathrobe to make it look creative. The bathrobe is plain and white. A cat walks into Emma's room. Emma sees the cat walk into her room.

Ollie is at the beach building a sand castle. Ollie wants to dig a deep hole with his spade. The spade is sharp and safe to use. A seagull lands near Ollie's sand castle. Ollie sees the seagull land near his sand castle.
Ben is at the train station. Ben wants to catch the train to go to work. The train is on time. A crazy dog runs across the train tracks. Ben sees the crazy dog run across the tracks.
Pia is at her school library. Pia wants to read a mystery book. The mystery book is on the top shelf. A cat sneaks into the library. Pia sees the cat sneak into the library.

Chloe is at a fair in her town. Chloe wants to hug the fireman at the fair. The fireman is very friendly. A clown starts making balloon animals at the fair. Chloe sees the clown making balloon animals.

Wendy is at a yard sale in her town. Wendy wants to buy a beautiful bracelet she saw. The bracelet is shiny and cheap. A dog runs through the yard sale, knocking over a table. Wendy sees the dog run through the yard sale.

Yara is in her room with her favorite teddy bear, Stitch. Yara wants to hide Stitch so her little brother cannot find him. Stitch smells like yummy vanilla because Yara sprayed him with her vanilla perfume. A cat enters the room through the open door. Yara sees the cat enter the room.
Nia is in her home, ready to bake a cake. Nia wants to bake a cake in the oven. The oven is in good working order. A cat walks into the kitchen. Nia sees the cat walk into the kitchen.

Amy is walking in the park. Amy wants to sit on a bench and rest. The bench is covered with pretty vines. A squirrel runs across the path in front of Amy. Amy sees the squirrel running across the path.

Kate is in the park with her old toy car. Kate wants to drive the toy car on the clean cloth she brought. The cloth is clean and spread on the grass. A butterfly lands on Kate's toy car. Kate sees the butterfly land on her toy car.
Ella is at the park with her parent. Ella wants to complete her ice cream before it melts. The ice cream has a sweet taste. A light rain begins to fall. Ella feels the light rain.

Uma is in her room with a big clock on the wall. Uma wants to move the clock to another room. The clock is brown. A cat enters the room and starts playing with a ball of yarn. Uma sees the cat playing.

Fred was at the park with his friends. Fred wanted to play a beautiful song on his trumpet for his friends. The trumpet was in his bag. A dog started chasing its tail near Fred. Fred saw the dog chasing its tail.
Amy was in her room playing with her toy angel. Amy wanted to make the angel fly in the air. The angel's wings were open wide. A butterfly enters the room. Amy sees the butterfly.
Sally is inside her house, thinking about the garden outside. Sally wants to plant flowers in the earth. The earth is dry and warm. A butterfly lands on a nearby flower. Sally sees the butterfly.
Dora is at the farm with her dad. Dora wants to ride the big, hairy horse. The horse is standing in the field. A butterfly lands on Dora's hand. Dora sees the butterfly land on her hand.

Ben was at the park playing with his dog. Ben wanted to make his dog's hair look nice by brushing it. The dog's hair was very safe to touch. A squirrel runs past Ben and his dog. Ben sees the squirrel run past.
Lila was in an ancient city. Lila wanted to walk on the ancient road. The road was full of old stones. A cat crossed her path. Lila saw the cat crossing her path.

Quinn was at the park on a sunny day. Quinn wanted to unite his friends for a fun event. Their picnic basket was full of food. A butterfly lands on Quinn's shoulder. Quinn sees the butterfly land on his shoulder.

Harry was at the park with his little red wagon. Harry wanted to ride his wagon down the big hill. The wagon was safe and sturdy. A butterfly lands on the handle of the wagon. Harry sees the butterfly.

Omar was on a beach during the day. Omar wanted to find a special shell hidden under the palm trees. The shells were hidden under the sand. A scared crab quickly runs across the beach. Omar sees the scared crab running across the beach.
Quentin was at the farm with all the animals. Quentin wanted to feed the goat. The goat was in the organized pen. A loud truck passes by the farm. Quentin hears the loud truck passing by.
Nia was in the attic of her old house. Nia wanted to find her old toy car in the attic. The toy car was charged. A bird lands on the attic window sill. Nia sees the bird land on the window sill.

Yolanda was at a toy store. Yolanda wanted to buy a model car for her little brother. The model car was on the top shelf. A clown starts performing tricks in the store. Yolanda notices the clown performing tricks.
Kim was in the park with her friends. Kim wanted to eat her pasta lunch. The pasta was in a plastic box. It starts to rain. Kim feels the rain.

Ben was in his room playing with his toy robot. Ben wanted his robot to move and speak. The toy robot's battery was fully charged. A cold breeze blew through the open window. Ben felt the cold breeze.
Sam was at a big art show. Sam wanted to buy a creative painting. The painting had a low price. A child starts to cry loudly in the art show. Sam hears the child crying.
Rita was at the park for a walk. Rita wanted to sit on a clean bench. The bench was clean and dry. A dog runs past her, chasing a ball. Rita sees the dog chasing the ball.
Polly was at the bus stop. Polly wanted to start her journey to school. The bus was on time. An icy wind blew through the bus stop. Polly felt the icy wind.
Zoe was in her room with a big box of toys. Zoe wanted to sort her toys and put them in the box. The box was open. A cat jumps onto the bed. Zoe sees the cat jump onto the bed.

Rosa was in her room with her furry cat. Rosa wanted to play music and have her cat sit with her. The music player was fully charged. A butterfly flies into the room through the open window. Rosa sees the butterfly fly into the room.
Nina was in the garden picking vegetables. Nina wanted to pick some crunchy celery for her salad. The celery was clean and fresh. A butterfly lands on a nearby flower. Nina sees the butterfly.
Ivy was at a pet shop. Ivy wanted to buy a small cat with soft fur. She had enough money to buy the cat. A dog in the pet shop starts barking loudly. Ivy hears the dog barking.
Mae was in her garden. Mae wanted to feed the birds with a worm. The worm was big and juicy. A rainbow appears in the sky. Mae sees the rainbow.
Ruby was at the park with her friends. Ruby wanted to skip with her jump rope. The rope was coiled up neatly. A group of birds start to sing loudly in a nearby tree. Ruby hears the birds singing.
Nellie was in the park with her friends. Nellie wanted to share her pizza with her friends. The pizza box was closed. A squirrel ran up a tree nearby. Nellie saw the squirrel run up the tree.

Harry was in school, waiting for the quiz to start. Harry wanted to do well on the quiz. The quiz looked easy. A bird flies into the classroom through the open window. Harry sees the bird fly into the classroom.
Iris was at a big game in the park. Iris wanted to find a lucky seat to watch the game. The seat was clean and dry. A squirrel runs across the field. Iris sees the squirrel run across the field.
Ella was at the park near the hospital. Ella wanted to eat her apple under the high tree. The apple was very fresh. An ambulance arrives at the nearby hospital. Ella sees the ambulance arrive.

Elsa was in the park with her friends. Elsa wanted to create a strong mud castle. The mud was wet and easy to shape. A butterfly lands on Elsa's shoulder. Elsa sees the butterfly land on her shoulder.

Rita was in her small village. Rita wanted the village to become more obedient and quiet. The village was peaceful and intact. A group of birds suddenly fly over the village. Rita sees the birds flying over the village.
Uma was at the park with her friends. Uma wanted to slide down the big slide. The slide was safe for kids. A curious cat wanders into the park. Uma sees the curious cat.

Yara was in her room, playing with her toy car. Yara wanted to make the toy car jump off a ramp she had made. The toy car was noisy and running. A cat walks into the room. Yara sees the cat walk into the room.
Dan was at school. Dan wanted to start a new club for kids who like to cook. The strawberries for the club were fresh and sweet. The school bell rings for lunch. Dan hears the school bell ring.
Kiki was in the garden near the poppy flowers. Kiki wanted to pick a jolly poppy for her mom. The poppy was whole. A butterfly lands on a nearby sunflower. Kiki notices the butterfly.

Sam was at the park playing with his toy horn. Sam wanted to show his friends how loud his metal horn could be. The metal horn was at room temperature. A dog runs past Sam and his friends. Sam sees the dog run past.
Daisy was at a fun party. Daisy wants to share a lovely meal with her friends. The meal was cold and not ready to eat yet. A song starts playing on the radio. Daisy hears the song.
